DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : The comparative efficacy levocetirizine 5 mg daily fexofenadine 60 mg twice daily histamine induced wheal , flare itch response measure 0 ( baseline ) , 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , 12 24 hour . Secondary objective : 1 . The area curve ( 0 , 12 hour , 12 - 24 hour 0 - 24 hour ) inhibition histamine induce wheal , flare itch response levocetirizine 5 mg daily fexofenadine 60 mg twice daily . 2 . The number individual peak response 10 percentile ( Because variable absorption fexofenadine , predict fexofenadine variable response individual ) . 3 . The mean plasma level levocetirizine fexofenadine 0 ( baseline ) , 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , 12 24 hour .
DOC.criteria: Eighteen ( 18 ) healthy male volunteer , include least 6 person Japanese origin , recruit study None subject take oral antihistamine , antidepressant , antipsychotic corticosteroid apply topical antihistamine , corticosteroid mast cell stabilizer skin 2 week prior test . No subject shall perform physical exercise 4 hour prior skin prick testing . Especially , Bronchial asthma , anaphylactic reaction history , use betablockers , skin disease test field exclusion criterion .
